title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4831.7 - Proofs annexed to counterstatement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4831.7 - Proofs annexed to counterstatement

State Regulations

The counterstatement of appeal shall have annexed, in the
form of affidavits and exhibits, proof in support of (a) any disputed facts, (b) any additional facts not presented to the municipal governing
body. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4831.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
